Name: Shattered Slime
About the game: Shattered Slime is a 2.5D platformer you play as a slime that can change its physical properties. Use this to escape the strange facility that the slime has found itself in. Platform, solve puzzles, and not to get shattered.
Meta Title: Shattered Slime: Mar 29, 2021, Jel Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Shattered Slime? Check out the release date (Mar 29, 2021), developer insights from Jel Studios, and a complete game summary.
